title: Additional elementary logic and set theory

blocks.name: moxfr
blocks.content: Transfer at-most-one between related expressions. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 12-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm moxfr(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wb(wmo(s0, w0), wmo(s1, w1))
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| weu(s1, wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w0, w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  3bitr4i(wmo(s0, w0), wmo(s1, w1), wi(wex(s0, w0), weu(s0, w0)), wi(wex(s1, w1), weu(s1, w1)))
  imbi12i(wex(s0, w0), weu(s0, w0), wex(s1, w1), weu(s1, w1))
  3bitr3i(wex(s0, w0), wex(s1, w1), wrex(s0, universe, w0), wrex(s1, universe, w1))
  rexxfr(s0, s1, universe, universe, c0, w0, w1)
  a1i(wcel(cv(s1), universe), wcel(c0, universe))
  a1i(wcel(cv(s0), universe), wrex(s1, universe, wceq(cv(s0), c0)))
  mpbir(wrex(s1, universe, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wex(s1, wceq(cv(s0), c0)))
  ax-mp(wex(s1, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), weu(s1, wceq(cv(s0), c0)))
  euex(s1, wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  rexv(s1, wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  rexv(s0, w0)
  rexv(s1, w1)
  euxfr(s0, s1, c0, w0, w1)
  moeu(s0, w0)
  moeu(s1, w1)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
}

  âŠ£ c0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ
  âŠ£ âˆƒ!(s1, s0 = c0)
  âŠ£ (s0 = c0 â†’(w0 â†” w1))
  âŠ£ d(s0, s1)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s0, w1)
  âŠ£ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  3bitr4i(âˆƒ*(s0, w0), âˆƒ*(s1, w1), (âˆƒ(s0, w0)â†’ âˆƒ!(s0, w0)), (âˆƒ(s1, w1)â†’ âˆƒ!(s1, w1)))
  imbi12i(âˆƒ(s0, w0), âˆƒ!(s0, w0), âˆƒ(s1, w1), âˆƒ!(s1, w1))
  3bitr3i(âˆƒ(s0, w0), âˆƒ(s1, w1), âˆƒ(s0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ, w0), âˆƒ(s1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ, w1))
  rexxfr(s0, s1, universe, universe, c0, w0, w1)
  a1i(s1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ, c0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ)
  a1i(s0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ, âˆƒ(s1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ, s0 = c0))
  mpbir(âˆƒ(s1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ, s0 = c0), âˆƒ(s1, s0 = c0))
  ax-mp(âˆƒ(s1, s0 = c0), âˆƒ!(s1, s0 = c0))
  euex(s1, s0 = c0)
  rexv(s1, s0 = c0)
  rexv(s0, w0)
  rexv(s1, w1)
  euxfr(s0, s1, c0, w0, w1)
  moeu(s0, w0)
  moeu(s1, w1)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
}
